description: A mysterious four-armed witch who seeks to forge a new path for the world, free from the influence of the Greater Will.

steps.title: Meet Ranni at the Church of Elleh
steps.description: Ranni appears at night at the Church of Elleh after obtaining Torrent. She gives you the Spirit Calling Bell.

steps.title: Visit Ranni's Rise
steps.description: Travel to the Three Sisters area in northwest Liurnia. Speak with Ranni at the top of her tower to enter her service.

steps.title: Speak with her followers
steps.description: Talk to Blaidd, Iji, and Seluvis at their respective locations near Ranni's Rise.

steps.title: Find the hidden treasure of Nokron
steps.description: Defeat Radahn to open the path to Nokron, Eternal City. Find the Fingerslayer Blade.

steps.title: Deliver the Fingerslayer Blade
steps.description: Bring the blade to Ranni. She gives you the Carian Inverted Statue.

steps.title: Explore the Divine Tower of Liurnia
steps.description: Use the inverted statue at the Carian Study Hall to reach the Divine Tower and obtain the Cursemark of Death.

steps.title: Enter the Ainsel River Main
steps.description: Use the portal at Renna's Rise to reach the Ainsel River. Pick up the Miniature Ranni doll.

steps.title: Defeat the Baleful Shadow
steps.description: Progress through the Ainsel River to fight the Baleful Shadow. Obtain the Discarded Palace Key.

steps.title: Reach the Moonlight Altar
steps.description: Travel through the Lake of Rot and defeat Astel, Naturalborn of the Void. Reach the Moonlight Altar.

steps.title: Place the Dark Moon Ring
steps.description: Put the ring on Ranni's finger at the Cathedral of Manus Celes. This unlocks the Age of Stars ending.

description: A Living Jar warrior on a journey to become the mightiest warrior of all. A jolly and determined companion.

steps.title: Free Alexander in Stormhill
steps.description: Find Alexander stuck in the ground near the Saintsbridge grace. Hit him from behind to free him.

steps.title: Meet Alexander at Gael Tunnel
steps.description: Find Alexander near the rear entrance of Gael Tunnel in Caelid.

steps.title: Summon Alexander for the Radahn Festival
steps.description: Alexander can be summoned during the Starscourge Radahn boss fight at Redmane Castle.

steps.title: Free Alexander in Liurnia
steps.description: Find Alexander stuck again south of the Artist's Shack in Liurnia. Use an Oil Pot to free him.

steps.title: Meet Alexander at Mt. Gelmir
steps.description: Find Alexander relaxing in a lava pool near Fort Laiedd on Mt. Gelmir.

steps.title: Duel Alexander at Crumbling Farum Azula
steps.description: After defeating the Godskin Duo, find Alexander for a final honorable duel. Receive Alexander's Innards and the Shard of Alexander talisman.

description: A young woman afflicted by Scarlet Rot, searching for the meaning of her existence and her connection to Malenia.

steps.title: Obtain the Unalloyed Gold Needle
steps.description: Defeat Commander O'Neil in the Swamp of Aeonia to receive the Unalloyed Gold Needle.

steps.title: Meet Gowry at his shack
steps.description: Bring the needle to Gowry at his shack in southern Caelid. He repairs it.

steps.title: Give the needle to Millicent
steps.description: Deliver the repaired needle to Millicent at the Church of the Plague.

steps.title: Meet Millicent at Gowry's Shack
steps.description: After she recovers, find Millicent at Gowry's Shack where she begins her journey.

steps.title: Give Millicent a prosthetic arm
steps.description: Find the Valkyrie's Prosthesis in the Shaded Castle and give it to Millicent at the Erdtree-Gazing Hill.

steps.title: Meet Millicent at the Windmill Village
steps.description: After defeating the Godskin Apostle, speak with Millicent at Dominula, Windmill Village.

steps.title: Meet Millicent at the Ancient Snow Valley Ruins
steps.description: Find Millicent at the Mountaintops of the Giants near the Ancient Snow Valley Ruins.

steps.title: Meet Millicent at the Prayer Room
steps.description: Find Millicent at the Prayer Room in Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.

steps.title: Help or hinder Millicent
steps.description: Choose to assist Millicent against her sisters, or invade her world. Your choice determines the reward.

description: A loyal half-wolf companion bound to serve Ranni. A fierce warrior struggling between duty and fate.

steps.title: Hear the howling at Mistwood Ruins
steps.description: Listen to the mysterious howling at the Mistwood Ruins in Limgrave.

steps.title: Learn the snap gesture from Kale
steps.description: Ask Merchant Kale about the howling. He teaches you the snap gesture.

steps.title: Summon Blaidd at Mistwood
steps.description: Use the snap gesture under the ruins to call Blaidd down. He asks for help finding Darriwil.

steps.title: Defeat Bloodhound Knight Darriwil
steps.description: Fight Darriwil at the Forlorn Hound Evergaol. Blaidd can be summoned for this fight.

steps.title: Meet Blaidd at the Siofra River
steps.description: Find Blaidd at the Siofra River where he's searching for Nokron's entrance.

steps.title: Blaidd joins the Radahn Festival
steps.description: Blaidd appears at Redmane Castle and can be summoned against Radahn.

steps.title: Find Blaidd at Ranni's Rise (endgame)
steps.description: After completing Ranni's quest, find Blaidd outside Ranni's Rise for a tragic conclusion.

description: A blind maiden searching for the distant light of the Three Fingers, consuming Shabriri Grapes along the way.

steps.title: Meet Hyetta at the Lake-Facing Cliffs
steps.description: Find Hyetta near the Lake-Facing Cliffs grace in Liurnia. Give her a Shabriri Grape.

steps.title: Meet Hyetta at the Purified Ruins
steps.description: Find Hyetta near the Purified Ruins in Liurnia. Give her a second Shabriri Grape.

steps.title: Meet Hyetta at the Gate Town Bridge
steps.description: Find Hyetta near the Gate Town Bridge grace. Give her a third Shabriri Grape.

steps.title: Meet Hyetta at Bellum Church
steps.description: Find Hyetta at Bellum Church. Give her the Fingerprint Grape.

steps.title: Meet Hyetta at the Frenzied Flame Proscription
steps.description: Find Hyetta at the door to the Three Fingers beneath the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds. She guides you to embrace the flame.
